message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. I believe this price point reflects its true worth.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,250,000. I think that's a fair price for the product's value to me.
